languages.text: "Твой единственный шанс ему помочь — застрелить и избавить от мук. Сейчас или никогда".
"Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."
languages.original_text: "Твой единственный шанс ему помочь — застрелить и избавить от мук. Сейчас или никогда".

traits.locale_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."
"Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."
"Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."
"Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."
"Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."
"Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

languages.text: « La seule manière de l'aider, c'est de lui épargner une longue agonie en l'achevant d'une balle. C'est maintenant ou jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

traits.locale_text: « La seule manière de l'aider, c'est de lui épargner une longue agonie en l'achevant d'une balle. C'est maintenant ou jamais. »

languages.text: “你唯一能救他的办法，就是杀了他，彻底结束他的痛苦。机不可失，时不再来。”
languages.original_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

traits.locale_text: “你唯一能救他的办法，就是杀了他，彻底结束他的痛苦。机不可失，时不再来。”

languages.text: 「彼を助ける唯一の方法は、彼を撃って苦しみを終わらせてやることだ。それは今しかない」
languages.original_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

traits.locale_text: 「彼を助ける唯一の方法は、彼を撃って苦しみを終わらせてやることだ。それは今しかない」

languages.text: "Ihr könnt ihm nur helfen, indem Ihr ihn erschießt und so sein Leiden beendet. Jetzt oder nie."
languages.original_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt ihm nur helfen, indem Ihr ihn erschießt und so sein Leiden beendet. Jetzt oder nie."

languages.text: «El único modo de ayudarle es dispararle y poner fin a su sufrimiento. Ahora o nunca».
languages.original_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

traits.locale_text: «El único modo de ayudarle es dispararle y poner fin a su sufrimiento. Ahora o nunca».

languages.text: "Ona yardım etmek mi istiyorsun? O zaman tek kurşunla acısına son ver. Fazla zamanın yok."
languages.original_text: "Your only chance of helping him is to shoot him and end his suffering. It is now or never."

traits.locale_text: "Ona yardım etmek mi istiyorsun? O zaman tek kurşunla acısına son ver. Ya şimdi ya hiç."
